title: Choose my Main
body:
So I have been getting a little bored of League lately, I need something to spice it up a little. So I decided to ask the boards for a new main. 

What does this mean? It means I might be dooming myself, but hey that's fine. 

Pick my main, Here are the choices: LITERALLY ANYTHING! META OR OFF-META!

Pick a champion and a role. I don't care what champion in what role. Just put your vote in the comments, if you see a vote you like then upvote it. The comment with the most upvotes by Friday the 9th at 7:00 Pm EST will be my new main. (**You do not get to decide my build**)

At that time I will be streaming my ~~failures~~ successes over at https://www.twitch.tv/doomlad1

replies.body:
http://i.imgur.com/5buMa.gif?noredirect

Come on peeps we need more Hue mains!

If you want fun you obviously have to play support.
If you want super fun you obviously need to play a squishy support.
If you want to be crazy, use all the colors!

full AP {{champion:36}}  mid lane

late game you can shred through squishies....sometimes
I tried that a long time ago, would have gotten a penta if my jungler didnt take it, lol
Wasn't I playing {{champion:99}} jungle as well?
{{champion:266}} ADC, TAKE UP THE CHALLENGE BRO
Funny enough, Ive actually tried that before
I very much enjoy Mundo top and Trundle top, so you might like them too.
